analyzed: gnod pa chung ba dang / nad med pa'i rang bzhin can ni lus kyi'o //
translated: The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.

original: spro ba che ba ni sems kyi'o zhes bya ba'o //🔽rnam par smin pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: spro ba che ba ni sems kyi'o zhes bya ba'o // rnam par smin pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.

original: sngar bstan pa'i rgyu gsum po ste /
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i rgyu gsum po ste /
translated: The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.🔽The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu nas ye shes kyi rgyu'i bar gyis rnam par smin pa bstan nas /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu nas ye shes kyi rgyu'i bar gyis rnam par smin pa bstan nas /
translated: The specific cause of the sense of touch is the four great elements.

original: de'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: The specific

original: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu gang zhe na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu gang zhe na zhes bya ba la /
translated: What is the cause of karmic maturation?

original: sems can gyi rgyud las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rnam par smin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyu yang rnam pa sna tshogs par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can gyi rgyud las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rnam par smin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyu yang rnam pa sna tshogs par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The cause of karmic maturation is taught to be of various types because the various types of karmic maturation are produced by various types of karmic actions in the continuum of sentient beings.

original: mi 'tshe ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mi 'tshe ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Nonviolence and so on.

original: rnam par smin pa re re la yang rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs pa yod pa yin na yang rnam par smin pa brgyad kyis rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir brgyad bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa re re la yang rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs pa yod pa yin na yang rnam par smin pa brgyad kyis rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir brgyad bstan pa yin te /
translated: Although each karmic maturation has various causes, eight are taught to show that they are the principal causes of the eight karmic maturations.

original: bya ba mang pos 'jigs pa'i spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bya ba mang pos 'jigs pa'i spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is frightening to have many things to do,

original: 'bri rdzi'i bu la bslab pa gsum bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bri rdzi'i bu la bslab pa gsum bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: it is like the three trainings taught to Śāriputra.

original: de yang mdo'i rjes su 'brangs nas rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang mdo'i rjes su 'brangs nas rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, they should be understood in accordance with the sūtras.

original: 'tshe ba ni srog gcod pa'o //
analyzed: 'tshe ba ni srog gcod pa'o //
translated: Violence is killing.

original: de las ldog pa ni mi 'tshe ba'o //
analyzed: de las ldog pa ni mi 'tshe ba'o //
translated: The opposite of that is nonviolence.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: That is of two types:

original: yang dag par blangs pas spangs pa dang / chos nyid kyis spangs pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par blangs pas spangs pa dang / chos nyid kyis spangs pa'o //
translated: Abandonment through proper undertaking and abandonment through reality.

original: de la yang dag par blangs pas spangs pa ni sdom pa rnam pa brgyad kyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang dag par blangs pas spangs pa ni sdom pa rnam pa brgyad kyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: Abandonment through proper undertaking is included in the eight vows.

original: chos nyid kyis spangs pa ni rgyun du @44b zhugs pa rnams kyi tshe brjes par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa nas gzung ba rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: chos nyid kyis spangs pa ni rgyun du @44b zhugs pa rnams kyi tshe brjes par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa nas gzung ba rnams kyi'o //
translated: Abandonment through reality is that of the stream-enterers when they change their life-stream and of those who have attained the second stage of the bodhisattva.

original: de gnyi gas bsdus pa'i mi 'tshe ba bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de gnyi gas bsdus pa'i mi 'tshe ba bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate non-violence which is included in both of these, he says:
